.
Regulatory Provisions in Effect Prior to November 1, 2000
Prior to November 1, 2000, pension, compensation, or emergency officersâ€™ pay was not payable to, or on account of, a Veteran who
was rated incompetent by the Department of Veterans Affairs
had no spouse or child
was institutionalized by the United States or any political subdivision thereof, and
had an estate that equaled or exceeded $1,500.
Only when the estate was subsequently reduced to $500 or less was payment to be resumed.
